showSection.title: Stranger Things
showSection.description: When a young boy vanishes, a small town uncovers a mystery involving secret experiments, terrifying supernatural forces, and one strange little girl.

episodes.episodeTitle: Chapter One: The Vanishing of Will Byers
episodes.description: On his way home from a friend's house, young Will sees something terrifying. Nearby, a sinister secret lurks in the depths of a government lab.

episodes.episodeTitle: Chapter Two: The Weirdo on Maple Street
episodes.description: Lucas, Mike, and Dustin try to talk to the girl they found in the woods. Hopper questions an anxious Joyce about an unsettling phone call.
An increasingly concerned Nancy looks for Barb and finds out what Jonathan's been up to. Joyce is convinced Will is trying to talk to her.
Refusing to believe Will is dead, Joyce tries to connect with her son. The boys give Eleven a makeover.

episodes.episodeTitle: Chapter Five: The Flea and the Acrobat
episodes.description: Hopper breaks into the lab while Nancy and Jonathan confront the force that took Will. The boys ask Mr. Clarke how to travel to another dimension.

reviews.author: Aniket Roy
reviews.comment: This movie was recommended to me by a very dear friend who went for the movie by herself. I went to the cinemas to watch but had a houseful board so couldn’t watch it.

reviews.author: Swanji
reviews.comment: A restless king promises his lands to the local priests in exchange of a stone (Phrygia, a city of Naxos Village) wherein he finds solace and peace of mind.
